comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: That looks awfully like a barrel.

comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content: Yes, looks to be a decoy.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: I'm thinking this may have been taken for comic effect. A real 42cm gun was Krupp's Big Bertha, which was 19 feet long, weighed 96,000 pounds, and fired shells weighing nearly a ton. The purported French version here is a wine barrel mounted in a small cart. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Bertha_(howitzer)
